name: Gun Fight (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
name_original: Gun Fight (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
This is a game in the Western time where an Sheriff and an Outlaw starts a duel also known as GUN FIGHT.

This game is a fight to the death between the 2 cowboys the Sheriff and the Outlaw.

Controls of the game are

Player 1 (Outlaw) W=Move up  A=Move left  S=Move down  D=Move right  Q=Aiming up  E=Aiming down  Space bar=Shoot

Player 2 (Sheriff) Num 8=Move up  Num 4=Move left  Num 5=Move down  Num 6=Move right  Num 7=Aiming up  Num 9=Aiming down  Down arrow=Shoot
